title: Streaming :D
body:
Learning ADC in Silver elo :D {{champion:51}} 

twitch.tv/foolishm8

replies.body:
Keep in mind not too many people will want to watch a low elo streamer unless you bring something unique to the party.

Maybe be a comedian, or like idk. Just find something unique if you wanna be successful. :)
Regardless of spam I'll be sure to check out an OCE streamer :D
